Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. With its exceptional features and unmatched quality, it's truly a must-have for anyone looking to elevate their experience. I'm extending this exclusive opportunity to you with an offer of $200. This investment in our product could potentially save you time, effort, and provide you with unparalleled benefits. Don't miss out on this chance to upgrade your life. Let me know if you have any questions or need further information about the product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
